entry.title: Rules and Guidelines: Grid Group, оцифровка недвижимости - Grid Group, real estate digitization
entry.content:
<b>RUS</b>

Впервые за всю историю интернета в сети появилась совершенно легальная Компания по оцифровке недвижимости во всём Мире, вплоть до одного квадратного метра. Офис компании находится в Грузии в городе Батуми по адресу: Georgia, Batumi, Parnavaz Mepe str., N 148/20. Компания зарегистрирована 17.06.2020 LEPL National Agency of Public Registry ID Number 445581095. Более детально ознакомиться <a href=https://gridgroup.cc/r-nvizit><b>на сайте Компании>>></b></a>

<b>ENG</b>

For the first time in the history of the Internet, a completely legal company has appeared on the Internet to digitize real estate around the World up to one square meter. The company's office is located in Georgia in the city of Batumi at the address: Georgia, Batumi, Parnavaz Me str., N 148/20. The company is registered on 17.06.2020 LEPL National Agency of Public Registry ID Number 445581095. For more information, visit <a href=https://gridgroup.cc/r-nvizit><b>the Company's website>>></b></a>

<a href=https://gridgroup.cc/r-nvizit><img src="https://avatars.mds.yandex.net/get-pdb/2427996/117ced48-e737-4e84-b9ff-3c1ce25e0667/s1200"></a>

.

entry.title: Rules and Guidelines: Guidelines
entry.content:
The public comment area is intended to gather feedback on documents which are about to be published by the Open Grid Forum. For detailed information on the OGF Document Process, please read GFD.152 .

This forum is not intended to be a location for debate, although exchanges which aim to clarify submitted comments are more than welcome. Document authors are encouraged to submit separate discussion forums within their respective Redmine projects for extended discussion threads.

Any Redmine member can submit comments in this forum. For people who wish to remain anonymous, please send your comments to public_comments@ogf.org -- they will be added to the respective forum anonymously.
